title: Cannot open game
body:
I went to open the game and nothing happened when i clicked it. i decided to delete the old game and redownload, however when i try to play it i get the error seen in the image. The problem is when i place it in the applications folder nothing happens. Can i get some help with this please?

As of now i have managed to fix the application problem but now i get this screen. No matter which option i take the loading screen remains indefinitely. http://imgur.com/dhGHfdr

replies.body:
Just to confirm, even after performing a full computer restart, do you still consistently see this error?  The League app should have been forced to shut down with a restart.

Reply back and let me know!
Heads up I'm a Mac player too and I am experiencing the same thing. After clicking on the icon it says its working but nothing opens up.
I did a full restart but the problem continued. However since then i did another redownload and and reboot and i got it to work again. Thanks for the help though!
Great to hear! :D  If you experience any further issues, don't hesitate to reply and let me know!
